item.title: Seeking Persian-Speaking Video Editor for Creative Projects - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

We are looking for a talented and creative video editor who is FLUENT IN PERSIAN to join our dynamic team. This role is ideal for someone who is passionate about video production and is skilled in crafting compelling visual stories.

Responsibilities:

Edit video content for various platforms such as YouTube, Instagram, and our company website.
Collaborate closely with our production team to understand project requirements and visions.
Ensure all edited content meets the needs of the project and is delivered on schedule.
Incorporate creative input while following guidelines and maintaining brand consistency.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously from inception to completion.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio to showcase your work.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Fluent in Persian, with excellent communication skills.
Ability to work flexibly and adapt to changing schedules and feedback.
Attention to detail and a keen eye for aesthetics and visual trends.

What We Offer:

Opportunity to work on exciting and varied video projects.
A collaborative and supportive team environment.

If you are enthusiastic about video editing and fluent in Persian, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of your best video editing work.

Looking forward to your applications!



Hourly Range: $15.00-$38.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 23:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Intro & Outro, Music Video, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Intro & Outro, Music Video, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Photoshop
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Media Assistant (VMA) / YouTube Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
_Job Description:_

We are seeking a Virtual Media Assistant (VMA) to help our team manage and create content for YouTube and other social media platforms. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, content creation, and social media management.

_Responsibilities:_

- Assist in brainstorming and researching topics for YouTube videos and social media content
- Edit and produce high-quality videos for YouTube using software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Develop a content calendar and schedule posts for the following social media platforms:
    - YouTube
    - Instagram
    - TikTok
    - Facebook
    - Twitter
    - LinkedIn
    - Pinterest
    - Reddit
- Assist in writing and optimizing video titles, descriptions, and tags for YouTube
- Provide guidance on best practices for YouTube and social media content creation
- Collaborate with our team to develop a consistent brand voice and style across all platforms
- Analyze engagement metrics and provide insights for future content creation

_Requirements:_

- 2+ years of experience in video editing, content creation, and social media management
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Strong knowledge of YouTube and social media algorithms and best practices
- Excellent communication and project management skills
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a remote team

_Preferred Qualifications:_

- Experience with graphic design and animation software such as Adobe Creative Suite
- Knowledge of SEO principles and how to apply them to video content
- Familiarity with social media scheduling tools such as Hootsuite or Buffer

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 22:59 UTC
Category: Social Media Strategy
Skills:Content Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Content Management, Audience Segmentation & Targeting, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, Social Media Management, YouTube Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Content Marketing Strategy, Content Creation, Content Management, Audience Segmentation & Targeting, Social Media Marketing, Content Writing, Social Media Management, YouTube Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Need Animated Video For My Business - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! I am currently in the process of finishing a new website for my marketing company. I want to add a video to my website explaining the services I offer but I also want it to be unique. If it's possible I want it to be cartoonish. If this sounds like something you could potentially do please submit a proposal with projects you have done before. item.title: 2D Animator Needed For New Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

Are you an experienced animator with a talent for enhancing CTR and boosting channel traffic? Are you looking for a long-term opportunity with a growing YouTube channel?

If so, you might be EXACTLY who we need!

We are seeking a skilled and dedicated animator for our YouTube channel, Simply Luxury. Our content revolves around luxury topics, particularly private islands, though we cover a wide range of subjects. We need someone with a background in working with YouTube channels. We ask for a commitment of at least 6 months, but ideally, we’d love a 12-month commitment to creating animations for our channel.

We’ll be posting ~10 videos a month, each ranging from eight to ten minutes long. There is also an opportunity for additional work on a new channel we plan to start, which will post ~4 videos a month, each ~20+ minutes long. Please mention this if you are interested. In your application, please include the YouTube channels you have previously worked with, along with a sample animation you’ve created. Applications without these references will not be considered.

Minimum Qualifications:

• Prior experience with YouTube automation channel animation.
• Ability to work across different platforms and stay up-to-date with assigned projects without missing deadlines.
• Strong communication skills.
• Effective time management.
• Effective teamwork.
• Willingness to revise animations as needed.
• Minimum 6-month commitment.
• Engaging and high-quality animations that reflect the content accurately without using AI tools or similar mass production techniques.
• IMPORTANT Understanding CTR and dynamically adjusting animations as needed.

Preferred Qualifications:

• 1 testimonial from a client you’ve worked with previously.
• 2+ years of animation experience.
• Familiarity with YouTube, particularly automated channels.
• Unique skills/specializations.
• Anything else that makes you stand out for this position.

If you believe you are qualified, please apply. We look forward to meeting you!

Cheers,
Simply Luxury YT

Hourly Range: $60.00-$105.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 22:29 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:2D Animation, YouTube, Video Editing, Animation, 3D Animation
Skills: 2D Animation, YouTube, Video Editing, Animation, 3D Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

Are you an experienced video editor with a talent for enhancing CTR and boosting channel traffic? Are you looking for a long-term opportunity with a growing YouTube channel?

If so, you might be EXACTLY who we need!

We are seeking a skilled and dedicated video editor for our YouTube channel, Simply Luxury. Our content revolves around luxury topics, particularly private islands, though we cover a wide range of subjects. We need someone with a background in working with YouTube channels. We ask for a commitment of at least 6 months, but ideally, we’d love a 12-month commitment to editing videos for our channel.

We’ll be posting ~10 videos a month, each ranging from eight to ten minutes long. There is also an opportunity for additional work on a new channel we plan to start, which will post ~4 videos a month, each ~20+ minutes long. Please mention this if you are interested. In your application, please include the YouTube channels you have previously worked with, along with a sample video you’ve edited. Applications without these references will not be considered.

Minimum Qualifications:

• Prior experience with YouTube automation channel video editing.
• Ability to work across different platforms and stay up-to-date with assigned projects without missing deadlines.
• Strong communication skills.
• Effective time management.
• Effective teamwork.
• Willingness to revise videos as needed.
• Minimum 6-month commitment.
• Engaging and high-quality edits that reflect the content accurately without using AI tools or similar mass production techniques.
• IMPORTANT Understanding CTR and dynamically adjusting edits as needed.

Preferred Qualifications:

• 1 testimonial from a client you’ve worked with previously.
• 2+ years of video editing experience.
• Familiarity with YouTube, particularly automated channels.
• Unique skills/specializations.
• Anything else that makes you stand out for this position.

If you believe you are qualified, please apply. We look forward to meeting you!

Cheers,
Simply Luxury YT
